name: Song Beater: Quite My Tempo!
detailed_description:
Song Beater is a VR rhythm game on steroids. Beat challenging songs with your bare fists in Fit Boxing mode, wield variety of weapons (blades, tonfas, phasers, staff, saw) in Free Style or concentrate on ideal text flow in Letter Hunter mode.

  • 3 game modes
  • 15 ranked songs and videos
  • Global and friends leaderboards, unique family party mode
  • Player statistics including estimated calories burnt for your fitness goals
  • Custom songs and videos support

More features


  • 5 difficulty levels (light, gentle, normal, intense and... impossibru)
  • Unique visualization for each song
  • Video playback (plus experimental YouTube support)
  • 30 Steam achievements
  • Level editor included
  • 3rd person cameras support (avatars) - great for watching players or streamers

Weapons (free style mode)

Wield variety of weapons (blades, tonfas, phasers, staff, saw) to increase your effective range. Master different techniques for perfect play.

Custom songs and videos

  • Song Beater can import custom songs from other games, e.g. in ModSaber format! Simply copy whole song directory to "Custom songs" directory in Song Beater and start the game. Your song should appear on Custom songs tab.
  • You can also create new songs (levels) using included level editor.

Songs credits

  • Bazooka – Mike Cortado
  • Biscuit (Extended Version) – Raven & Kreyn
  • Breathe – Axl & Arth
  • Bush Week – Nihilore
  • Congratulations (remix) – Party In Backyard (orig. PewDiePie, Roomie & Boyinaband)
  • Do It Like You – Insta Models
  • Don't Blame It On Me – Axl & Arth
  • Eat em up – Justin Being Rude
  • Fuzz – Roman "Mem" Nepsinsky
  • Grace on the Dancefloor – TeknoAXE
  • Stuck On U – DIZARO
  • The Promise – Damien Miles
  • Yeah – Roman "Mem" Nepsinsky
  • What – Roman "Mem" Nepsinsky
  • Who's gonna love ya – Bad Parties
Visit official Song Beater game website to see full credits and links to all artists and their portfolios!

short_description: VR rhythm game on steroids. Beat challenging songs with your bare fists in Fit Boxing, wield variety of weapons (blades, tonfas, phasers, staff, saw) in Free Style or concentrate on text flow in Letter Hunter mode. Global and friends leaderboards, calories burnt statistics. Custom songs and videos support.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960/1050Ti / AMD Radeon R9 290/RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/1060 / AMD Radeon R9 290/RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
